pages.text: The Path of the Aegis is the path of the protector. Rally against the forces of evil, cast protective spells, and shield yourself from harm while saving others from blight.$(br2)$(l:amethyst_imbuement:scepter_aegis_routes)Routes on the Path of the Aegis$(/l)
